name: Beef Tips and Gravy
author: Jamie
summary: This meal has been a favorite for many years. It is basically beef tips browned and slowly cooked until tender. We usually serve this with homemade mashed potatoes and corn.
ingredients: 1 pound beef stew meat, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  cream of mushroom soup
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4  potatoes, peeled and cubed, or more to taste
¼ cup butter, or to taste
¼ cup milk, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained
directions: Cook in a large skillet over medium heat until browned on all sides, about 20 minutes
Stir in cream of mushroom soup, 2 1/2 cups milk, salt, and pepper
Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, until thickened to gravy consistency, at least 1 hour
Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Add 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup milk, salt, and pepper; beat with an electric mixer until smooth
Heat corn in a saucepan over medium heat until tender, about 15 minutes
Pour beef and gravy mixture over mashed potatoes and place corn on the side to serve
